item.description:
Social Fun FREE tour of  Le Cordon Bleu Culinary College with FREE parking

Le Cordon Bleu Culinary College 215 First Street • Cambridge, MA 02142

I have arranged FREE  off street parking in their parking lot is between 2nd and 3rd on Binney St. and it is called the “Brown Lot”. (Please do not tell anyone else about this, this just for us)

PLease make sure you meet us on time at 10:15AM  that means you should plan to be there 5-10 minute incase you get lost or need extra time to get to the 3rd floor!

Go to 215 1st Street, its in a red brick building that says “The Athenaeum Building and Cambridge Athletic Club” on the outside. When you get into the main lobby, take Elevator B to the 3rd floor and ask for Biagio or Social Fun.

10:15AM Meet the Social Fun group and your wonderful fellow members for a round of introductions.

10:30AM  Start tour of Le Cordon Bleu Culinary College and Kitchen.

11:00 AM Attend a special Cooking Demonstration on Perfect Grilling Secrets  …shhh don’t tell anyone! Lol

11:30 Am sample the wonder food that was just prepared as part of the wonderful event.

If anyone want to contribute to me the voluntary yearly group Meetup fee of $10 to help keep the Social Fun Meetup group going and so I can keep bringing you wonderful events like this it would be much appreciated.

Thanks keep having fun enjoy life. Biagio
item.how_to_find_us: Go to 215 1st Street in a red brick building that says “The Athenaeum Building and Cambridge Athletic Club” on the outside. When you get into the main lobby, take Elevator B to the 3rd floor and ask for Biagio or Social Fun.
item.name: Tour of Le Cordon Bleu Culinary College+ Cooking Demo+ Tasting+ Parking All FREE
